payload.content: Build an operating system for thinking with AI by having Claude Code run Obsidian vaults to extract key concepts, connect them to existing knowledge, and build a living representation of your thinking.

name: Build an operating system for thinking with AI by having Claude Code run Obsidia
content: Build an operating system for thinking with AI by having Claude Code run Obsidian vaults to extract key concepts, connect them to existing knowledge, and build a living representation of your thinking.

payload.content: The methodology of how one thinks becomes an integral part of the AI system when using a vault, as it's all stored in markdown files that the user fully owns.

name: The methodology of how one thinks becomes an integral part of the AI system when
content: The methodology of how one thinks becomes an integral part of the AI system when using a vault, as it's all stored in markdown files that the user fully owns.

payload.content: AI as a thinking partner focuses on augmenting human thought processes rather than merely assisting with writing tasks.

name: AI as a thinking partner focuses on augmenting human thought processes rather th
content: AI as a thinking partner focuses on augmenting human thought processes rather than merely assisting with writing tasks.

payload.content: Knowledge bases and codebases are similar in that both are folders of text files with relationships, conventions, patterns, and benefit from agents that can navigate and operate them.

name: Knowledge bases and codebases are similar in that both are folders of text files
content: Knowledge bases and codebases are similar in that both are folders of text files with relationships, conventions, patterns, and benefit from agents that can navigate and operate them.

payload.content: Vibe coding, which allows AI to handle implementation while humans focus on direction, can be applied to knowledge work, shifting from manual note-taking to operating a system that takes notes.

name: Vibe coding, which allows AI to handle implementation while humans focus on dire
content: Vibe coding, which allows AI to handle implementation while humans focus on direction, can be applied to knowledge work, shifting from manual note-taking to operating a system that takes notes.

payload.content: A 'vault' is defined as a folder of markdown files that link to each other using `[[wiki links]]`, creating a network of ideas that agents can follow.

name: A 'vault' is defined as a folder of markdown files that link to each other using
content: A 'vault' is defined as a folder of markdown files that link to each other using `[[wiki links]]`, creating a network of ideas that agents can follow.

payload.content: To write good notes, weave links directly into sentences (e.g., 'because [[quality is the hard part]] we need to focus on curation') rather than placing them as footnotes, allowing the agent to follow the reasoning.

name: To write good notes, weave links directly into sentences (e.g., 'because [[quali
content: To write good notes, weave links directly into sentences (e.g., 'because [[quality is the hard part]] we need to focus on curation') rather than placing them as footnotes, allowing the agent to follow the reasoning.

payload.content: Write notes that are self-contained and composable, meaning a reader should understand a note without needing to read other notes first, similar to Lego blocks that are complete on their own but connect to build larger structures.

name: Write notes that are self-contained and composable, meaning a reader should unde
content: Write notes that are self-contained and composable, meaning a reader should understand a note without needing to read other notes first, similar to Lego blocks that are complete on their own but connect to build larger structures.

payload.content: AI does not automatically understand a user's philosophy; it must be explicitly taught, often revealing the extent of implicit knowledge carried by the user.

name: AI does not automatically understand a user's philosophy; it must be explicitly
content: AI does not automatically understand a user's philosophy; it must be explicitly taught, often revealing the extent of implicit knowledge carried by the user.

payload.content: Every vault needs its own philosophy and principles, tailored to its specific purpose, much like codebases require different structures for different types of applications.

name: Every vault needs its own philosophy and principles, tailored to its specific pu
content: Every vault needs its own philosophy and principles, tailored to its specific purpose, much like codebases require different structures for different types of applications.

payload.content: The underlying pattern for AI-driven knowledge vaults includes: markdown files with links readable by AI, a `CLAUDE.md` file to teach the agent the system, a structure for quick agent orientation, and conventions written as instructions for AI consistency.

name: The underlying pattern for AI-driven knowledge vaults includes: markdown files w
content: The underlying pattern for AI-driven knowledge vaults includes: markdown files with links readable by AI, a `CLAUDE.md` file to teach the agent the system, a structure for quick agent orientation, and conventions written as instructions for AI consistency.

payload.content: Different vault types emphasize different principles: a work vault might prioritize capture first, project folders, and client context; a research vault, source tracking, literature notes, and claim verification; and a creative vault, idea capture, draft progression, and reference organization.

name: Different vault types emphasize different principles: a work vault might priorit
content: Different vault types emphasize different principles: a work vault might prioritize capture first, project folders, and client context; a research vault, source tracking, literature notes, and claim verification; and a creative vault, idea capture, draft progression, and reference organization.

payload.content: A core principle for a thinking vault is 'depth over breadth, quality over speed,' emphasizing complete understanding of tasks and creating work that future agents can build upon, rather than focusing on efficiency.

name: A core principle for a thinking vault is 'depth over breadth, quality over speed
content: A core principle for a thinking vault is 'depth over breadth, quality over speed,' emphasizing complete understanding of tasks and creating work that future agents can build upon, rather than focusing on efficiency.

payload.content: Claude finds information in a vault through a layered system: first, by seeing the folder structure via a session start hook; second, by scanning an index file with one-sentence descriptions of notes; and third, by using topic pages (MOCs) that link to related notes and contain AI's learned navigation insights.

name: Claude finds information in a vault through a layered system: first, by seeing t
content: Claude finds information in a vault through a layered system: first, by seeing the folder structure via a session start hook; second, by scanning an index file with one-sentence descriptions of notes; and third, by using topic pages (MOCs) that link to related notes and contain AI's learned navigation insights.

payload.content: Ensure notes are composable: if linking to a note requires explaining three other things first, split it up.

name: Ensure notes are composable: if linking to a note requires explaining three othe
content: Ensure notes are composable: if linking to a note requires explaining three other things first, split it up.

payload.content: Name notes as claims (e.g., 'quality is the hard part') instead of topics ('thoughts on AI slop') so that the title naturally integrates into sentences when linked, forcing the AI to understand the claim.

name: Name notes as claims (e.g., 'quality is the hard part') instead of topics ('thou
content: Name notes as claims (e.g., 'quality is the hard part') instead of topics ('thoughts on AI slop') so that the title naturally integrates into sentences when linked, forcing the AI to understand the claim.

payload.content: The network of notes, particularly notes with many incoming links, is more valuable than individual isolated notes because each link creates a new reading path, making the network itself the knowledge.

name: The network of notes, particularly notes with many incoming links, is more valua
content: The network of notes, particularly notes with many incoming links, is more valuable than individual isolated notes because each link creates a new reading path, making the network itself the knowledge.

payload.content: An AI agent should operate by orienting itself at the start of each task, scanning the vault structure, checking the index for relevant notes, and reading topic pages before making changes, always following links to build understanding.

name: An AI agent should operate by orienting itself at the start of each task, scanni
content: An AI agent should operate by orienting itself at the start of each task, scanning the vault structure, checking the index for relevant notes, and reading topic pages before making changes, always following links to build understanding.

payload.content: When an AI agent discovers useful navigation insights about a topic, it should record them in the topic page to allow future sessions to learn from past navigation.

name: When an AI agent discovers useful navigation insights about a topic, it should r
content: When an AI agent discovers useful navigation insights about a topic, it should record them in the topic page to allow future sessions to learn from past navigation.

payload.content: A note with many incoming links is more valuable than an isolated note because every link creates a new reading path.

name: A note with many incoming links is more valuable than an isolated note because e
content: A note with many incoming links is more valuable than an isolated note because every link creates a new reading path.

payload.content: When two notes interact in interesting ways, the AI agent should create a new note capturing the insight that emerges from combining them.

name: When two notes interact in interesting ways, the AI agent should create a new no
content: When two notes interact in interesting ways, the AI agent should create a new note capturing the insight that emerges from combining them.

payload.content: Every new capture of information should trigger a search for related notes by the AI agent, which then adds links with context.

name: Every new capture of information should trigger a search for related notes by th
content: Every new capture of information should trigger a search for related notes by the AI agent, which then adds links with context.

payload.content: The provided folder architecture for a personal thinking vault includes: 00_inbox (capture zone), 01_thinking (your notes and topic pages, with a subfolder for individual notes), 02_reference (stuff from others), 03_creating (drafts in progress), 04_published (finished work), 05_archive (old stuff), and 06_system (templates and config).

name: The provided folder architecture for a personal thinking vault includes: 00_inbo
content: The provided folder architecture for a personal thinking vault includes: 00_inbox (capture zone), 01_thinking (your notes and topic pages, with a subfolder for individual notes), 02_reference (stuff from others), 03_creating (drafts in progress), 04_published (finished work), 05_archive (old stuff), and 06_system (templates and config).

payload.content: The specific folders in a vault architecture are less important than the principle that folder location should indicate what something is.

name: The specific folders in a vault architecture are less important than the princip
content: The specific folders in a vault architecture are less important than the principle that folder location should indicate what something is.

payload.content: Markdown is the core system for a vault, and tools like Obsidian are merely interfaces, ensuring the vault's survival even if an application disappears.

name: Markdown is the core system for a vault, and tools like Obsidian are merely inte
content: Markdown is the core system for a vault, and tools like Obsidian are merely interfaces, ensuring the vault's survival even if an application disappears.

payload.content: All content in this system is plain text, readable by any editor and processable by any AI, ensuring complete data ownership.

name: All content in this system is plain text, readable by any editor and processable
content: All content in this system is plain text, readable by any editor and processable by any AI, ensuring complete data ownership.

payload.content: To start a personal thinking vault: 1. Create a folder with subfolders tailored to your purpose. 2. Write a CLAUDE.md file explaining your system, starting simple and evolving it. 3. Let Claude operate by capturing content and asking it to find connections, navigate, discover relationships, and suggest organization.

name: To start a personal thinking vault: 1. Create a folder with subfolders tailored
content: To start a personal thinking vault: 1. Create a folder with subfolders tailored to your purpose. 2. Write a CLAUDE.md file explaining your system, starting simple and evolving it. 3. Let Claude operate by capturing content and asking it to find connections, navigate, discover relationships, and suggest organization.

payload.content: Always review what the AI produces and edit for quality.

name: Always review what the AI produces and edit for quality.
content: Always review what the AI produces and edit for quality.

payload.content: The human role in an AI-assisted note-taking system evolves from writer to editor and from creator to curator, focusing on judgment and deciding what matters.

name: The human role in an AI-assisted note-taking system evolves from writer to edito
content: The human role in an AI-assisted note-taking system evolves from writer to editor and from creator to curator, focusing on judgment and deciding what matters.

payload.content: Vibe note taking, analogous to vibe coding, changes how we think.

name: Vibe note taking, analogous to vibe coding, changes how we think.
content: Vibe note taking, analogous to vibe coding, changes how we think.

payload.content: A vault consists of markdown files linked to each other.

name: A vault consists of markdown files linked to each other.
content: A vault consists of markdown files linked to each other.

payload.content: Vaults provide memory for LLMs, which inherently lack it.

name: Vaults provide memory for LLMs, which inherently lack it.
content: Vaults provide memory for LLMs, which inherently lack it.

payload.content: A CLAUDE.md file teaches the AI how your specific system works.

name: A CLAUDE.md file teaches the AI how your specific system works.
content: A CLAUDE.md file teaches the AI how your specific system works.

payload.content: Every vault requires its own philosophy based on its purpose.

name: Every vault requires its own philosophy based on its purpose.
content: Every vault requires its own philosophy based on its purpose.

payload.content: Markdown, links, and AI operation with human judgment are constant elements in this evolving system.

name: Markdown, links, and AI operation with human judgment are constant elements in t
content: Markdown, links, and AI operation with human judgment are constant elements in this evolving system.
